tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I got root canal treatment for my 5 year old son from Dr Vivian. After taking 3 opinions from other dentists in Borivali area I was still very sceptical to get it done from them as they were always in hurry, did not bother much to explain the situation, and on how to deal with small children.

** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ********* ******* ** **** ** ******** * ** ******* He reduced the fear of the treatment and also was extremely friendly with my son which made him trust doctor and get the treatment done in peace. 

He was Very polite and patient in explaining us the situation and what best can be done.. with minimal damage.

Very hygienic clinic with kid friendly decor and courteous staff !! 

We are very satisfied and happy to get a great family dentist for our son now! Even during pandemic he helped us with the most dreading treatment and made it look like nothing! 

And yes! The little surprise gifts for kids add up to the brownie points :) 

All  the best  Dr Vivian ! More power to you ! 🙌

Thank you 😊
reply_text: Thank you madam for such a kind and wholesome review.

can we go to the dentist today?” Asks my 3 year old baby while following his appointment. Enough said. **** ** *** **** ********* ****** ******* Friendly caring staff and a dentist who is passionate and understands kids far better than any doctor I’ve seen.
